thread.title: Flavor Chaser
thread.title_full: Planet of the Vapes reviewed by Flavor Chaser

author: Flavor Chaser
title: Flavor Chaser
text: I ordered a Flowermate Swift Pro and received it within a few days! I made a mistake while entering my mailing address and just emailed POV and Julie had the issue resolved within a couple of hours. The Swift Pro was just what I was looking for excellent product for the price. My order came with two freebies that made the transaction even smoother! I will be using this company in the future and recommend it to anyone.
